name: SecureField
desc: A control into which the user securely enters private text.

items.name: init(LocalizedStringKey, text: Binding<String>, prompt: Text?)
items.desc: Creates a secure field with a prompt generated from a Text.

items.desc: Creates a secure field with a prompt generated from a Text.

items.name: init(text: Binding<String>, prompt: Text?, label: () -> Label)
items.desc: Creates a secure field with a prompt generated from a Text.

items.name: init(LocalizedStringKey, text: Binding<String>)
items.desc: Creates a secure field with a prompt generated from a Text.

items.name: init<S>(S, text: Binding<String>)
items.desc: Creates a secure field with a prompt generated from a Text.

items.name: func keyboardType(UIKeyboardType) -> some View
items.desc: Sets the keyboard type for this view.

items.name: func disableAutocorrection(Bool?) -> some View
items.desc: Sets whether to disable autocorrection for this view.

items.name: func textInputAutocapitalization(TextInputAutocapitalization?) -> some View
items.desc: Sets how often the shift key in the keyboard is automatically enabled.

items.name: func textContentType(UITextContentType?) -> some View
items.desc: Sets the text content type for this view, which the system uses to offer suggestions while the user enters text on an iOS or tvOS device.

items.name: func textContentType(NSTextContentType?) -> some View
items.desc: Sets the text content type for this view, which the system uses to offer suggestions while the user enters text on macOS.

items.name: func textContentType(WKTextContentType?) -> some View
items.desc: Sets the text content type for this view, which the system uses to offer suggestions while the user enters text on a watchOS device.

items.name: var body: some View
items.desc: The content and behavior of the view.

items.desc: The type of view representing the body of this view.
